items.summary: Nature Communications, Published online: 24 October 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-64541-5 Candidate PET ligands targeting pathological TDP-43 aggregates are characterized by Vokali and colleagues in a series of human tissue, cell/animal model, and non-human primate experiments. Their preclinical data suggests favorable specificity and pharmacokinetic profiles of their two candidate tracers, which could translate into a disease-specific biomarker in TDP-43 proteinopathies.

Lauritz Klaus
Manfred J. Mark
Giacomo Lamporesi
Thomas Bland

items.summary: Nature Physics, Published online: 23 October 2025; doi:10.1038/s41567-025-03065-7 Supersolids combine superfluid and crystal order and their response to external driving remains unclear.
